data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hu, Xiu, Huang, Jia-qi, Tan, Jia-chuan, Yong-qingWu,, Chen, Juan (2018): Hedychiumviridibracteatum X. Hu, a new species from Guangxi Autonomous Region, South China. PhytoKeys 110: 69-79, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.110.28710, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.110.28710
